attributes.action: Financially support all UK students and non-working citizens immediately
attributes.additional_details: The COVID-19 crisis has already caused significant financial problems for millions of people in the UK. Several businesses and jobs have recently been shut down, and now that the source of income has disappeared, very numerous people will soon be on the edge of bankruptcy. Therefore, I firmly believe that help should be provided with immediately, so that people in the UK will be more able to cope with the situation.
attributes.background: I am asking the Government to start giving essential funds to all UK students and non-working citizens as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
We have published a petition calling on the Government to implement Universal Basic Income to give home and food security through Covid-19, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
